DOC.brief_title: US 10 mL Biologic Lung Volume Reduction ( BLVR ) Phase 2 Emphysema Study
DOC.detailed_description: Prospective , open-label , non-controlled , multi-center Phase 2 Study evaluate efficacy safety 10 mL BLVR System patient advance upper lobe predominant emphysema . Twenty patient divide 2 group 10 patient treat conscious sedation total 8 subsegments . Group 1 treat 4 subsegments 1 lung second treatment 4 subsegments lung 6 12 week later . Group 2 receive treatment 8 subsegments ( 4 lung ) single treatment session possible ; complete 1 session remain subsegments treat 6 12 week later . Patients follow 96 week completion final BLVR treatment . All patient receive standard medical therapy addition BLVR treatment .
